plays.text: Penalty to Ronald Petrovicky 2 minutes for Crosschecking Manny Malhotra

Penalty to Dave Manson 2 minutes for Roughing Steve Begin
Penalty to Steve Begin 2 minutes for Roughing Dave Manson
Goal scored by Rob DiMaio assisted by Brenden Morrow and Derian Hatcher

Penalty to Derian Hatcher 2 minutes for Charging Denis Gauthier
